reviewText: The Hot Shoe is informative and fun to watch. Hear Johnny Chang, Andy Bloch, Ian Andersen and others talk blackjack. You even get to see Johnny Chang, Andy Bloch, and Richard Chen in team play. The excellent advice offered by Ian Andersen and Andy Bloch alone is more than worth the price of the dvd.

The potential of this movie was enormous ,however it doesnt quite live up to its expectations considering the "actual counters/authors" involved
Not a must-have but certainly not a complete waste of money.
